item1:
群组基本数据维护
Basic data maintenance for groups
item2:
管理立库群组的基本数据、管理者及是否启用
Manage the basic data of the WES user group, the group owner, and whether to enable it
item4:
有管理权限的使用者
Users with administrative rights
item5:
群组编码、群组名称
Group ID, group name
输出
item6:
群组基本数据
Group basic data
异常处里
item7:
如果无符合条件的群组数据，系统将提示查无此群组信息；
如果因为网路中断产生的异常，须结束WES软件，请网路管理人员恢复网路后再重启WES
If the WES software needs to be terminated due to an abnormality caused by a network interruption, ask the network administrator to restore the network and restart WES
操作步骤
item8:
1. 输入查询条件或挑选群组编码后点选Query查询群组数据
Enter query conditions or select group code and click Query to query group data
2. 输入群组基本信息后，如已存在系统内的点选Update更新；不存在系统的点选Create建创新的群组
After entering the basic group information, click Update if it already exists in the system; click Create if there is no system to create an new group
3. 点选功能菜单Refresh可清除画面上的数据回到初始状态
Click refresh to clear the data on the screen and return to the initial state
4. 点选功能菜单Exit或关闭视窗可结束此作业
Click the function menu exit or close window to end this job
后置条件
item9:
执行S040 Group User Data Maintain确认使用者与群组的分配
Execute S040 Group User Data Maintain to confirm user and group assignment
备注
